com.snamp.connectors

Interface AttributeTypeInfo

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AttributeJavaTypeInfo<T>, AttributeTabularType, AttributeTypeInfoBuilder.AttributeConvertibleTypeInfo<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttributeArrayType

    public interface AttributeTypeInfo
    Represents an information about attribute type.

    It is recommended to use AttributeTypeInfoBuilder for creating attribute types.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Roman Sakno
    See Also:
    AttributeTypeInfoBuilder

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> boolean canConvertFrom(java.lang.Class<T> source)
      Determines whether the value of the specified type can be passed as attribute value.
      <T> boolean canConvertTo(java.lang.Class<T> target)
      Determines whether the attribute value can be converted into the specified type.
      <T> T convertTo(java.lang.Object value, java.lang.Class<T> target)
      Converts the attribute value to the specified type.

    • Method Detail

      • canConvertTo

        <T> boolean canConvertTo(java.lang.Class<T> target)
        Determines whether the attribute value can be converted into the specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the conversion result.
        Parameters:
        target - The result of the conversion.
        Returns:
        true, if conversion to the specified type is supported.

      • convertTo

        <T> T convertTo(java.lang.Object value,
              java.lang.Class<T> target)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Converts the attribute value to the specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the conversion result.
        Parameters:
        value - The attribute value to convert.
        target - The type of the conversion result.
        Returns:
        The conversion result.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The target type is not supported.

      • canConvertFrom

        <T> boolean canConvertFrom(java.lang.Class<T> source)
        Determines whether the value of the specified type can be passed as attribute value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value.
        Parameters:
        source - The type of the value that can be converted to the attribute value.
        Returns:
        true, if conversion from the specified type is supported; otherwise, false.
